title: 01/27/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/27/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, we're joined by NFL Network's Tom Pelissero who discusses some of the Head Coaching moves that were made this morning. Ross Tucker calls in to talk Big Ben's decision to retire. Actor Kevin James previews his new movie "Home Team". And Former Saints Head Coach Sean Payton calls in to discuss the possibility of coaching in the NFL again and starting a career in broadcasting.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Ross Tucker calls in to talk Big Ben's decision to retire. Actor Kevin James previews his new movie "Home Team". And Former Saints Head Coach Sean Payton calls in to discuss the possibility of coaching in the NFL again and starting a career in broadcasting.
